content: Three-tool cordless combos Three tools cordless combos ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Power tool combo kits ### FEATURES:Features High capacity batteries for the best run time NO COST wear and tear coverage for tools, batteries and chargers Tools designed to increase productivity by delivering corded performance Select combos include Hilti bits, blades or sockets Increases productivity because all tools work with same battery Applications Professional level work on any jobsite All-in-one solution for a set of trade applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 3863710 - SID 6 + SCO 6 + SD 5000-22 Combo - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SID 6-22 Cordl. impact driver assy - 1x Belt hook cordless - 1x SD 5000-22 ROW Cordl. dryw. screwdr. - 1x S-B PH2 25/1 IF Driver bit - 1x S-BH M 50/2 Bit holder - 1x Depth gauge - 1x SCO 6-22 Cordl. cut-out tool - 1x SCO 6-A22 Dust removal system kit - 1x C 4-22 02 110-127V Battery charger - 2x B 22-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x Tool bag medium - 3554462 - SF 6H + SID 4 + SR 6 ADV CMPCT COMBO - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SF 6H-A22 02 Cordl. ham. dr. driver - 1x SR 6-A22 Cordl. reciprocating saw - 1x SID 4-A22 Cordl. impact driver assy - 1x C 4/36-90 100-127V Battery charger - 2x Belt hook for SF/SI cordless tools - 2x B 22/4.0 Battery pack - 1x Tool bag medium - 3551243 - SCO 6 + SL 6-A22 + SID 4 ADV CMPCT COMB - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SCO 6-A22 Cordl. cut-out tool - 1x SCO 6-A22 Dust removal system kit - 1x SL 6-A22 Cordl. area light - 1x SID 4-A22 Cordl. impact driver assy - 1x C 4/36-90 100-127V Battery charger - 1x Belt hook for SF/SI cordless tools - 10x Cut-out bit SCOB DG 1/8 (10) - 20x Cut-out bit SCOB DG 5/32 (10) - 10x Cut-out bit SCOB D 1/8 (10) - 2x B 22/4.0 Battery pack - 1x Tool bag medium - 3551244 - SCO 6 + SL 6-A22 + SID 4 compact - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SCO 6-A22 Cordl. cut-out tool - 1x SCO 6-A22 Dust removal system kit - 1x SL 6-A22 Cordl. area light - 1x SID 4-A22 Cordl. impact driver assy - 1x C 4/36-90 100-127V Battery charger - 1x Belt hook for SF/SI cordless tools - 10x Cut-out bit SCOB DG 1/8 (10) - 10x Cut-out bit SCOB DG 5/32 (10) - 10x Cut-out bit SCOB D 1/8 (10) - 2x B 22/2.6 Battery pack - 1x Tool bag medium - 3619904 - 12V 3-Tool Kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SF 2H-A12 Cordl. ham. dr. driver - 1x SID 2-A12 Cordl. impact driver - 1x SFD 2-A12 Cordl. drill driver - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 3x Belt hook for SF/SI cordless tools - 2x B 12-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x S Soft Pouch
